description: Frico Edam cheese has a mellow and savoury taste. Edam cheese is a perfect cheese for an entertainment platter. Make this platter even more special by including the Frico Goats cheese; a cheese made from 100% pure goats milk with a mild and soft taste.
name: Entertainment Platter With Frico Cheese Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 230 g Frico Mild Edam Cheese Wedge
230 g Frico Mild Goats Cheese Wedge

recipeInstructions.text: Place the nuts and apricots next to the cheese cubes. Enjoy!
